resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105169</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105169</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205719</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Teaching Shakespeare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterrichtendes Shakespeare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Shakespeare d'Enseignement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Shakespeare Ensinando</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Shakespeare D'istruzione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διδασκαλία Shakespeare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Shakespeare De enseñanza</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This site contains over 90 lesson plans relating to aspects of the works and times of the great playwright. Primary sources and study guides are also available.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Site enthält über 90 Lektionplänen in 
bezug auf Aspekte der Arbeiten und der Zeiten des großen 
Stückeschreibers. Primärquellen und Studie Anleitungen sind 
auch vorhanden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce site contient plus de 90 plans de leçon 
concernant des aspects des travaux et des temps du grand dramaturge. 
Les sources et les guides primaires d'étude sont également 
disponibles.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este local contem sobre 90 plantas da lição que 
relacionam-se aos aspectos dos trabalhos e dos tempos do playwright 
grande. As fontes e as guias preliminares do estudo estão 
também disponíveis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo luogo contiene oltre 90 programmi di 
lezione concernente le funzioni degli impianti e dei tempi del 
playwright grande. Le sorgenti e le guide primarie di studio 
sono egualmente disponibili.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η περιοχή περιέχει πάνω από 90 σχέδια 
μαθήματος σχετικά με τις πτυχές των εργασιών και των χρόνων του 
μεγάλου θεατρικού συγγραφέα. Οι αρχικές πηγές και οι 
οδηγοί μελέτης είναι επίσης διαθέσιμοι.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este sitio contiene sobre 90 planes de la lección
referente a los aspectos de los trabajos y de los tiempos del gran 
dramaturgo. Las fuentes y las guías primarias del estudio 
están también disponibles.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205719</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105169</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/teaching-shakespeare</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
